identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial Precision with Swiss Typography.
Content is King: Data density is the aesthetic. No fluff.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in factory environments.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group functional areas, not just for decoration.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

body.usage: Table data, Form labels, General text

mono.usage: IDs, SKUs, Matrix Input Numbers, Status Codes

rules: Data cells must use 'text-sm' or 'text-xs' for density.
Labels must be 'uppercase tracking-wider text-xs font-semibold text-muted-foreground'.

containers.dashboard_widget: flex flex-col gap-2 p-6 rounded-xl border bg-card shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

matrix_input.name: ProductionMatrix
matrix_input.description: Excel-style grid for Sizes (Columns) x Colors (Rows).
matrix_input.input_styling: w-full h-10 text-center border-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-primary font-mono
matrix_input.header_styling: bg-muted/50 font-semibold text-center p-2 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

status_badge.name: StatusBadge
status_badge.styling: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

data_table.header: bg-muted/50 text-muted-foreground font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b sticky top-0 z-50

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for active states.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use APCA for subtle grays.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-primary on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: All inputs must have labels. Matrix inputs must have aria-label='Size X Color Y'.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'ProductionMatrix' component with keyboard navigation (arrow keys to move between cells).
Use the defined 'status_palette' for the 'Estado' field in the Registration CRUD.
Ensure the 'Curva' field is treated as a text input as requested.
The 'Registro' form is the most complex; break it down into sections: General Info, Production Details, and the Matrix.
Add a Dark Mode toggle in the main layout header.
All text must be in Spanish.
Do not use 'Inter' font. Import 'Manrope', 'IBM Plex Sans', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center align the app container.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic; keep it crisp, dense, and functional.
